title: 2.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Add a layout to a web page, as shown here, to include an image and a small description about it.

For example:
You can add an image of your garden and write three lines about it in the layout. An example of the description is given below:
“My garden is the best part of my house. It is located in front of the house. It adds to the beauty of my house and surrounding areas”.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
